item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 17, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:

29. Un Ministral, Des Ministraux (187 points | 84 comments)
30. Making the Python back end for my new webapp (58 points | 35 comments)
